english_example_sentence: You, on this difficult path of life, never die hopeless.
russian_example_sentence: Вы, на этом трудном жизненном пути, никогда не умираете безнадежными.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz, bu zorlu hayat yolunda, asla umutsuz ölmezsiniz.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz, bu zorlu hayat yolunda, asla umutsuz ______.
